walkthroughs.title: Welcome to Black Mesa
walkthroughs.description: Prepare your HEV Mark IV protective system for a productive coding session.

steps.title: Equip the Suit
steps.description:
Select the Half-Life Dark Theme to change your environment's colors. 
[Select Theme](command:workbench.action.selectTheme)

steps.title: Identify Assets
steps.description:
Apply the Lambda icons to your file explorer. 
[Select File Icon Theme](command:workbench.action.selectIconTheme)

steps.title: Audio Diagnostics
steps.description:
Enable HEV voice feedback. Remember: Linux users need `mpg123` installed. 
[Enable All Sounds](command:hl2Theme.enableAllSounds)

half-life-theme.enableSounds.description: Master switch to enable/disable all HEV sounds.

half-life-theme.enableStartupSound.description: Play sound when VS Code starts.

half-life-theme.enableTerminalOpenSound.description: Play combine radio when show the terminal

half-life-theme.enableTerminalErrorSound.description: Play 'Major fracture' when a command fails in the terminal.

half-life-theme.enableFileSaveSound.description: Play sound when saving a file.

half-life-theme.enableFileOpenSound.description: Play sound when open a file.

half-life-theme.enableFileClosedSound.description: Play sound when Closed a file.

half-life-theme.enableFileCreatedSound.description: Play sound when creating a file.

half-life-theme.enableFileDeletedSound.description: Play sound when delete a file.

half-life-theme.enableTabSwitchSound.description: Play sound when switching between files.
